entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
